job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: strongstrongWhat Youll DobrbrstrongstrongCisco is funding a small agile product development team to innovate and build a new product offering in the SDN controller space The team will operate in an agile development model to rapidly bring a new product offering to market reacting very quickly to initial customer feedback and market needs Over time as customer adoption increases the platform will be further utilized as the basis for many network applicationsbrbrstrongstrongWho Youll Work WithbrbrstrongstrongCisco is looking to hire a Software Engineer to contribute to the team and team culture the product and the process to bring it to market Heshe must have experience in building new software offerings with agility and urgencybrbrstrongstrongWho You ArebrbrstrongstrongResponsibilities  Be part of a team of engineers involved in the development and testing of software for our next generation campus networking architecturebrulli Participate in design discussions and develop highscale data collection analysis and reporting systems for both customer and Cisco uselili Work with architects and product owners  customers to help define feature functionalitylili Operate in an Agile methodology with an eye toward robust and disciplined software developmentlili Contribute to functional specifications Write portions of product spec and help seek clarity where it doesnt existlili Design amp Develop large portions of software independently and rapidlylili Strong ability and desire to learn new tools as required is an absolute mustlili This team will move forward with the most modern and appropriate technologies for the task at handbrliulstronguMinimum QualificationsbrbrustrongBachelors  7 years of related experience or Masters  5 years of related experiencebrulli experience in Java or other modern programming languages  technologieslili Strong understating of OOA amp D design patterns and SOA architectures and horizontal scalability tenetslili Experience in or passion for building a PaaS solution using Kubernetes Docker etclili Experience in use of standard SCM tools Git and CICD Jenkins  Maven etc processlili Ability to work and influence teams beyond your immediate groupliliStrong motivation to innovate and improve customer and product experiencelili Strong problem solving and software development troubleshooting skills Ability to think in code and discuss ideas and algorithms is a mustlili Follows development best practices like TDD code reviews and owns automated tests to ensure qualitylili Past experience working in an Agile  Scrum environmentbrliulstrongstrongWhy CiscobrbrstrongstrongWeAreCisco where each person is unique but we bring our talents to work as a team and make a difference powering an inclusive future for allbrbrWe embrace digital and help our customers implement change in their digital businesses Some may think were old 36 years strong and only about hardware but were also a software company And a security company We even invented an intuitive network that adapts predicts learns and protects No other company can do what we do  you cant put us in a boxbrbrBut Digital Transformation is an empty buzz phrase without a culture that allows for innovation creativity and yes even failure if you learn from itbrbrDay to day we focus on the give and take We give our best give our egos a break and give of ourselves because giving back is built into our DNA We take accountability bold steps and take difference to heart Because without diversity of thought and a dedication to equality for all there is no moving forwardbrbrSo you have colorful hair Dont care Tattoos Show off your ink Like polka dots Thats cool Pop culture geek Many of us are Passion for technology and world changing Be you with us
